column4: I have a Chaintech GeForce FX5200 connected with a single-link DVI cable to an Asus V242H.  I should be able to push 1920x1080 but instead I'm stuck with a blurry 1440x900.  Any ideas?
Oh, right.  Thank you... here goes.
Hmm... it doesn't have resolutions listed like I expected...  here is my entire xorg.conf: http://pastebin.org/10686
